92167.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「私が この温泉:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>I'm these hot springs' caretaker, Regina. This deep
in the mountains, you've done well coming here.
Please, enter the hot springs at your leisure, okay.

92168.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「まあ！ 素敵な:
My! What lovely souvenirs, thank you very much. Reminds me of the old days... Similarly, I was given these two by someone, you know.
...Eh? You came at Yakup's request? What a dear. That man—even now—is he healthy, I wonder?
...Is that so. His back hurts. That pains me... Then, right away, please deliver this Hot Spring Flower to him for me.

92169.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「この先の温泉に:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>The hot springs beyond here are very therapeutic. If
you give thanks to the spirits within the shrine, you
may receive their blessing, you know.

92170.ルジナに 白梅の枝と\n薄紅の宝貝を 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1>: Give Regina the White Plum Branch and Pink Cowrie?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

92171.<pc>は ルジナに\n白梅の枝と 薄紅の宝貝を 渡した！:
<pc> gave Regina the White Plum Branch and
Pink Cowrie!

92172.<pc>は\nモンセロの湯の花（だいじなもの）を\n受け取った！<me 60>:
<pc> received the Monsero Hot Spring Flower
(Key Item)!<me 60>

92173.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「この先の温泉に:
The hot springs beyond here are very therapeutic. If you give thanks to the spirits within the shrine, you may receive their blessing, you know.
You put in the effort to come here, so certainly, please enter the hot springs, won't you.
Even the man who always used to bring me souvenirs would spend countless hours in the hot water, until he'd get dizzy and pass out...Oohoohoo.

92178.魔物が現れたので メルン水車郷へ 避難します。\nこの温泉は 危険です。\n:
Monsters appeared, so I'm taking refuge at Melun
Waterwheel. These hot springs are dangerous.
             -Monsero Hot Springs' caretaker, Regina
